reviews.review_msg: Dr.Ruhl is an awesome teacher. As a male I never found that she was unfair towards men or anything. And I participated, without always agreeing with her, regularly. She's funny, quick, smart and intresting. I defenetly recommend her. Her tests and assignments are somewhat hard but, but fair, & she will help clarify any problems on assignments.
completely agree...the notes are long and he totally tests you on things you wouldn't even think could appear on an exam just because they're that minute and ridiculous...but he's a nice guy

He is horrible prof. Very rude and unpleasant. Likes to talk and doesn't like to listn to other opinions. He is liberal and likes to show off who he knows. I don't recommend him to anyone. I didn't learn anything in his course. It was waste of my time and money.
he's awesome, knows what he's talking about, but is very anti-Bush
